response.overview: The footballer who was defined by Jorge Valdano as 'from cartoons' is today one of the most respected political figures in his country. Ronald Koeman, Michael Laudrup, Jorge Valdano approach this Plus+ Report to remember the Brazilian's time in LaLiga. They and those who dealt with him the most on and off the field reviewed the mark that the Brazilian left in both Barcelona and Valencia, the two cities that enjoyed one of the greatest footballers.
response.title: Romario in Spain. Ungovernable
